name: TIME (itch)
description:
An Abstract Visual Novel.

Experience An Interpretation Of The Concept Of Time Through Moments Of Depression...

Enter the diary of a mad man.

In times of deep contemplation... we are alone with our minds... Limited though as we maybe... Moments of Paranoia and Frustration Bring out Expression That is feared. Feared Through Lack Of Understanding or Disinterest. Entries are expressed in times of Great Loneliness(Mental) and Isolation(Physical).

The First Release In The "Journal" Series.
Journal Entries Expressed Through Visual Novels.

A Michael T Moreno Game.
